strength_details: Established multinational corporation (IBM) with stable employment
Clear BI data engineer role with specific focus on Cognos development
concern_details: No salary information disclosed - compensation transparency lacking
No career growth, learning opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned
Traditional BI tools (Cognos) may limit exposure to modern data engineering
Consulting delivery center model may involve client pressure and travel
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers (3+ years) seeking stable corporate role
Candidates with Cognos experience looking for IBM consulting opportunities
Engineers preferring traditional BI over modern data stack
probe_details: Ask about salary range and compensation structure
Understand career progression opportunities within IBM
Clarify team structure and reporting relationships
Discuss typical project timelines and client engagement model
leverage_details: Cognos Developer & Admin combination is specialized skill set
BI/DW project experience with reporting and visualization expertise
summary.overall_assessment: Stable corporate BI data engineer role at IBM with clear responsibilities but limited growth opportunities. Good for candidates seeking traditional BI work with established company, but lacks modern data engineering exposure and career development. Main concerns are compensation transparency and traditional technology stack.
